item.description:
Hi everyone,
My name is Sophia and I am the group organizer and I would like to invite everyone to the center of Light on Sunday at noon for an hour of introduction to meditation. I have been meditating daily for the past 2 years and have felt immense inner peace and joy and would like to share what I have learnt with everyone. Meditation is listening to the still small voice within and it takes practice and is often easier with a group. So come and join me and find your path to the peace within.
Hope to see you there.
Please e-mail or call 617-894-8866 if you plan on joining me. thanks
item.name: group meditation
